rlu.foundation.exceptions
Class SimpleErrorHandler

java.lang.Object
  rlu.foundation.exceptions.ErrorHandler
      rlu.foundation.exceptions.SimpleErrorHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApplicationFrame.MessageLogErrorHandler
public class SimpleErrorHandler
extends ErrorHandler

Simple text-based error handler which writes messages to the standard error stream.

Author:
R. Lunde

          Primitive operation, responsible for integrating exception class specific information into the message string.
 void handleError(java.lang.Throwable t)
          Communicates error messages to the user by calling method printMessageAndCause(String, Throwable, int) and additionally provides a stack trace if debugMode is enabled.
 void handleFatalError(java.lang.Throwable t)
          Communicates fatal error messages to the user by calling method printMessageAndCause(String, Throwable, int), provides a stack trace if debugMode is enabled, and exits the application.

Method Detail

handleWarning

public void handleWarning(java.lang.Throwable t)
Communicates warning messages to the user by calling method printMessageAndCause(String, Throwable, int) and additionally provides a stack trace if debugMode is enabled.

Specified by:
handleWarning in class ErrorHandler

handleError

public void handleError(java.lang.Throwable t)
Communicates error messages to the user by calling method printMessageAndCause(String, Throwable, int) and additionally provides a stack trace if debugMode is enabled.

Specified by:
handleError in class ErrorHandler

handleFatalError

public void handleFatalError(java.lang.Throwable t)
Communicates fatal error messages to the user by calling method printMessageAndCause(String, Throwable, int), provides a stack trace if debugMode is enabled, and exits the application.

Specified by:
handleFatalError in class ErrorHandler

printMessageAndCause

protected void printMessageAndCause(java.lang.String type,
                                    java.lang.Throwable t,
                                    int indent)
Template method, which prints a message text for a given exception and recursively messages explaining the cause of the exception. The concrete behavior can be modified by overriding the primitive operations getExtendedMessage(Throwable) and print(String).

getExtendedMessage

protected java.lang.String getExtendedMessage(java.lang.Throwable t)
Primitive operation, responsible for integrating exception class specific information into the message string. This implementation adds column and row information to SAXParseException messages.

print

protected void print(java.lang.String text)
Primitive operation, responsible for printing messages. This implementation simply uses the standard error stream.
